Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 69th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near 35th/Archer due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near 35th/Archer due to a signal problem

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
